divs: Sighting DetailsI was with my homies and as i was lying on the ground outside i saw a boomerang like flying scary thing. I took pictures but i was sooo terrified aqnd i saw flames coming out of it. after like 5 minutes of looking at it i heard noises from the outside then it started to come closer and closer. But then it started zooming away and dissappeared.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Berkley
There were no other sightings in Berkley on or around January 27th 2011
